data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Vâlcea, Romania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vâlcea, Romania
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Vâlcea. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Vâlcea, Romania the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Vâlcea with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Vâlcea to agree with you and with one another.
Father, help your children in Vâlcea, Romania find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Vâlcea, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
